welcome:
üçé *Welcome to Apple Updates Bot!*

I'm a bot that notifies about Apple software updates.

Please select the language of Apple Updates you want to monitor:
no_languages: ‚ö†Ô∏è Sorry, no languages are available at the moment. Please try again later.
language_selected:
‚úÖ *Language selected: {display_name}*

You will now receive Apple Updates in this language.
no_updates: ‚ÑπÔ∏è No updates available yet for this language. You'll be notified when new updates are published.
recent_updates_header: üì± *Here are the {count} most recent Apple Updates:*
stop_confirmation:
*CrazyOnes - Subscription stopped*

You will no longer receive Apple Updates notifications.
Send /start anytime to subscribe again.
not_subscribed:
‚ÑπÔ∏è You are not currently subscribed to notifications.
Send /start to subscribe.
start_welcome:
*Welcome to _*CrazyOnes*_ Bot!*

You are now subscribed with language: _{display_name}_
about_message:
*CrazyOnes* is a _Telegram bot_ that keeps you updated on Apple's operating system and software releases.

Type /help for information on how to interact with the bot.

Developed by [_Geek-MD_](https://github.com/Geek-MD/CrazyOnes)
help_updates: ‚Ä¢ _/updates_ - Show last 10 updates in your language
help_updates_tag: ‚Ä¢ _/updates [tag]_ - Show last 10 updates filtered by tag (e.g., _/updates ios_)
help_language: ‚Ä¢ _/language [code]_ - List languages or show updates (e.g., _/language en-us_)
help_description: This bot monitors Apple's software update releases and sends you notifications when new updates are available.
updates_no_updates: ‚ÑπÔ∏è No updates available yet for your language. You'll be notified when new updates are published.
updates_header:
*CrazyOnes - Apple Updates*
_{display_name}_

Here are the 10 most recent updates:
updates_invalid_tag: ‚ùå Invalid tag format. Only letters, numbers, hyphens, underscores, and spaces are allowed.
updates_found_tag:
*CrazyOnes - Apple Updates*
_{display_name}_

Found {count} update(s) for tag *{tag}*

Showing the {showing} most recent:
updates_not_found_tag:
‚ùå No updates found for tag *{tag}*

Did you mean: {suggestions}?

Please reply with one of the suggested tags or use `/updates [tag]` with a different tag.
updates_not_found_no_suggestions:
‚ùå No updates found for tag *{tag}*

Use `/updates` without parameters to see all recent updates.
language_not_available:
‚ö†Ô∏è No languages are currently available.
Please try again later.
language_list_footer:
Total: {count} languages available

Use _/language [code]_ to subscribe for specific language updates.
Example: _/language en-us_
language_invalid_format:
‚ùå Invalid language code format. Only letters, numbers, and hyphens are allowed.

Use /language to see all available languages.
language_not_found:
‚ùå Language `{language_code}` ({display_name}) is not available.

Use /language to see all available languages.
language_updated:
‚úÖ Language preference updated to *{display_name}*

Use _/updates_ to see the most recent updates in this language.
language_not_subscribed:
‚úÖ Language set to *{display_name}*

Use _/updates_ to see the most recent updates in this language.

üí° Use /start to subscribe and set this as your default language.
unknown_command_no_suggestion:
‚ùå Unknown command: `/{command}`

Use /help to see all available commands.
